column4: What will fix it to where on boot, it wont ask for a keyring for the internet??
What will fix it to where on boot, it wont ask for a keyring for the internet??
What will fix it to where on boot, it wont ask for a keyring for the internet??
you need to use "Unsafe Storage" see http://davestechsupport.com/blog/2009/01/16/how-to-remove-ubuntus-password-keyring/ for some slightly outdated info (probably still works?)
